text: Young Adam is a 2003 British crime drama movie. The cast for this movie are Ewan McGregor, Tilda Swinton Peter Mullan and Emily Mortimer. The screenplay for this movie is based on the 1954 novel of the same name. This movie is set in Scotland in 1954. Young Adam is rated NC-17 due to sexual content. == Other websites == * Category:2003 crime drama movies Category:British crime drama movies Category:2000s English-language movies Category:Film noir Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies set in Scotland Category:Movies set in the 1950s Category:NC-17 rated movies
title: Young Adam
